text:
[Verse]
City lights they call my name
Bright skies no two the same
Lost in thoughts of somewhere new
Chasing sunsets just me and you

[Verse 2]
Feet on pavement hearts in flight
New adventures every night
Maps forgotten no fixed plan
Together here we take our stand

[Chorus]
Wanderlust in every beat
In our souls where worlds we meet
Dance with dreams until they come
Our adventure just begun

[Verse 3]
Morning whispers ocean breeze
Find the places time might freeze
Climb the mountains touch the sky
Feel the freedom you and I

[Bridge]
Every day’s a new surprise
Magic seen through open eyes
Journey on we'll never cease
In this moment find our peace

[Verse 4]
Roads ahead and tales unsung
Sing our stories on our tongue
Every step a brand new chance
Fall in love with life's romance
title: Wanderlust Dreams
